CustomField.description: This refers to the number of times a user is still allowed to retake a quiz in order to complete it, based on the maximum number of retakes allowed. For example, if a user is allowed up to 3 retakes to pass the quiz and has already taken the quiz twice, their "number of retakes remaining" would be 1.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This refers to the number of times a user is still allowed to retake a quiz in order to complete it, based on the maximum number of retakes allowed. For example, if a user is allowed up to 3 retakes to pass the quiz and has already taken the quiz twice, their "number of retakes remaining" would be 1.
CustomField.label: Number of Retakes Remaining
